trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Azione trigger che fornisce funzionalità per eseguire la ricerca (ignorando) a un momento specifico all'interno del periodo attivo di una <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un'azione SeekStoryboard con una <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>da cercare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che le operazioni di ricerca non accettano lo storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>in considerazione le impostazioni: lo storyboard viene trattato come se avesse un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>pari a 1 e non <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Resume, arresto o in caso contrario controllo un Storyboard in modo interattivo per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare in caso contrario un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>proprietà del relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) per controllarlo facendo riferimento al relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la quantità di spostare in avanti o indietro rispetto all'origine di ricerca <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore positivo o negativo che specifica la quantità di spostare in avanti o indietro rispetto all'origine di ricerca <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione da cui questa operazione di ricerca <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>viene applicato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: La posizione da cui questa operazione di ricerca <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>viene applicato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>della proprietà di questa <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> deve essere serializzata.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se il <> </> *> proprietà di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> deve essere serializzato; in caso contrario, * *false**.
